snippet.title: online game『Laid-Back Camp All -in -one!!』OPmovie
snippet.description:
The first online game of TV anime《Laid-Back Camp》 is scheduled to be released on 6/15.

▼Pre-register
- App Store：
https://apps.apple.com/jp/app/id1661047955
- Google Play Store：
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=jp.enish.yurucampgame

We plan to deliver various information on this account as well. 
Please follow me!
https://twitter.com/yurucamp_game_e


▼『Laid-Back Camp All -in -one!!』

”I can watch this game all the time...!”

The first online game with all the elements of the TV anime ""Laid-Back Camp"" is finally here! Familiar characters such as Nadeshiko Kagamihara,Rin Shima,Chiaki Ōgaki,Aoi Inuyama,and Ena Saitō engage in rich dialogue with motion and full voice acting, as well as over 1,000 camping gear and vehicles, delicious-looking camp meals, and beautiful scenery from Yamanashi, Nagano, and Shizuoka, among other locations. More elements from the TV anime 'Laid-Back Camp' are expected to be appeared soon!

Why don't you come and watch everyone you know camping!

Official website
https://yurucamp-game.enish.com/
